definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: only [[בָּבַת עֵינוֹ]] Zec 2:12 the apple of his eye (Aram. bobto0 d9ayno0; [[בָּבָא]] gate Targum Es 5:14; Thes sub [[נבב]] to which Ges gives sense perforate, hence opening of eye; but cf. Ar. buw’buw’o9yn pupil of eye, perh. = bab=ah;un Dozy:49 babe, baby, bêbê (imitating infant's prattle) i.e. child of the eye; v. Hi St, Fl in ChWB:i. 419 b; cf. [[אישׁוֹן]] ?).
